summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image displays a video game interface showing the equipment menu. The highlighted item is the "Rat Sage Staff," classified as an epic weapon. It has an attack power of 66 and a critical hit chance of 7%. The staff possesses a unique effect described as "The Fourth Move of Light Attack Combo and Mobile Staff Spin," which can create a whirlwind of sands, increasing attack range and damage. The screen also shows various character stats on the right side, including health, attack, and defense attributes. The bottom of the screen provides options to view the weapon list, examine details, and return to the previous menu.
